thread.title: Emmy Award Winning Author, Robert Agnello, Publishes New Book in The Glimmer Series
thread.title_full: Emmy Award Winning Author, Robert Agnello, Publishes New Book in The Glimmer Series - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Emmy Award Winning Author, Robert Agnello, Publishes New Book in The Glimmer Series
text:
Robert Agnello
NEW YORK , Oct. 8, Robert Agnello , of On The Lamb Productions and Emmy Award Winning Carmen Sandiego music fame, publishes new book in The Glimmer Series. A Glimmer is a being of light. They are what make the world glow. There are Glimmers of love, hope, compassion, joy and truth.
Agnello is introducing Ignate Knorr, the Glimmer of Respect. This is the second book in the award winning Glimmer series. Ruby Shroo, the Glimmer of Truth, is the first book in the series.
Ruby Shroo was born when a courageous truth was told. Glimmers are born every time a good deed is done and truth told.
Glimmers have been around since the beginning of time. When the earth was formed, all the love and joy on this beautiful planet produced these little beings of light.
Agnello explains the book, "Ignate is a glimmer of respect who loses his glow because the man he surrounds loses respect for everyone. Ruby helps get Ignate's glow back. Friends always help friends and respecting people keeps your Glimmers of Respect glowing bright."
On The Lamb Productions has won two Mom's Choice Awards for their books.
